name: bookish
description: A simple platform for creating readable, accessible online books.

scripts.build-assets: cp src/style/bookish.css build/; cp -R src/images build/
scripts.build-reader: npm run clean; npm run build-assets; node ./esbuild.frontend.js
scripts.ship-reader: set -e -o pipefail; npm run build-reader; terser build/bookish.js -m -c -o build/bookish.js; npm run sync
scripts.build-app: node ./esbuild.backend.js; cp src/index.html public/; cp -R src/images public/; cp -R src/style public/
